# Results by using R code
```{r}
df<-read.csv("rawActivity.csv")
```

```{r}
library(pracma)
```

```{r}
x=rep(0,99)
for(i in 1:99){
  x[i]=sample_entropy(df[,i],r=0.2)
}
x=x[1:99]
x
```
